response.overview: "Wicked Lamb's "The Furies" written directed edited produced and starring Elliot Passantino. Filmed for 1500$ in 2019. Starring Rachel Jenack, Michael Kazimir, Jason Suter, Liz Chuday, Danny Bacher, NJ Pfautsch, Gina Carson, Pamela Manzella, Rich Hayek and more! Shot in Wayne, Ringwood and Rockaway. Music by Steffan Pitzel, Gods of Macho,Dave Lehner, From Evil, Sean Faust, Vinnie Manzella, and more!"
response.title: The Furies
